verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin, a t'ayach tzin say in colnab'il. In gana tzin col in b'a t'ayach icha tz'aj scolan sb'a nok' yunetac caxlanh t'a yalanh sk'axil snun, masanto ol lajwoquek' jun yaelal tik.
Ach in Diosal te niwan elk'ochi, tzin awaj t'ayach, yujto a achnhej tzach colwajnhej wed'oc.
Ha yuj a wach'k'olal, yuj pax to tz'elk'och tas tzala', yuj chi' masanto t'a satcha’anh tzak'cot in colnab'il. Ol in a colel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' tzin ixtan chi'.
Ichato t'a skal nok' choj schi'an anima ayin eq'ui. Ha k'een ye heb' lajan icha k'een lanza yet' te' jul-lab'. Ha tas syal heb', lajan icha k'een espada te jay ye.
Ach in Diosal, tzek'b'at sniwanil elk'och t'a satcha’anh. Ha sniwanil elk'och chi', chequel t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ha heb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ayin, ix yak'em in yaalil heb', manhxo animaoc waj yuj heb', ix sb'oan jun olan heb' t'a yol in b'e, palta anheja' heb' ix b'at t'a yool.
Ach in Diosal, b'ekan in k'ool, in gana tzach in b'itej yet' wach' lolonel.
Yuj chi' ol wak'el in wayanh, ol ach in b'itej yet' te' arpa yet' salterio. Ayic wan sakb'i, ol el in wayanh, ol ach in b'itani.
Mamin, ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal juntzanh chonhab'. Ol ach in b'itej t'a skal juntzanh nación.
Niwan ton a wach'k'olal, masanto t'a satcha’anh sk'ochi. Tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala'.
Ach in Diosal, tzek'b'at sniwanil elk'och t'a satcha’anh. Ha sniwanil elk'och chi', chequel t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
